meanings.def: to make a disease or an illness spread to a person, an animal or a plant
examples: infect somebody/something (with something) It is not possible to infect another person through kissing.
(be) infected with something people infected with HIV

meanings.def: to make a substance contain harmful bacteria that can spread disease
examples: be infected (with something) The eggs were infected with salmonella.

meanings.def: to make a computer virus spread to another computer or program
to make somebody share a particular feeling
examples: She infected the children with her enthusiasm for music.
The whole room was soon infected by his laughter.
